description:
Zofis no longer has the upperhand and attempts to distract Sherry by tossing Koko down a cliff. However, Sherry anticipates this and catches Koko in midair averting a tragedy. Zofis is now at the end of his rope, he has his spell book taken way and is for
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: シェリー・ブラゴ 新たなる門出
